allforone.name: AllForOne
allforone.subtitle: Tool to help families with Alzheimer
allforone.description: AllForOne is my end-of-degree project. It's an Android application to assist families with members diagnosed of the Alzheimer's disease providing tools like shared task management, geolocalization or real-time chat, all of this over a bonding system. It consists in two big modules: the frontend, an Android app made in Kotlin; and the backend service, a Node.js API deployed in Azure. The communication between the points is made through HTTP with a REST API and via Websocket, depending on each use case.

oito.name: Oito
oito.subtitle: Chip-8 Emulator
oito.description: Oito is an emulator of the Chip-8 virtual machine completely coded in Rust with a hard effort in the creation of the most meaningful code that was possible. The project is divided in three main crates: the core managing all the backend logic, the desktop frontend using SDL2 and the web crate to compile the emulator to WebAssembly an be able to execute it on a webpage. The web version of the emulator can be used in one of the following links.
